item.title: Checkout
item.dc:creator: prabinjha2074@gmail.com

item.title: Refund and Returns Policy
item.dc:creator: prabinjha2074@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:
This is a sample page.

Overview

Our refund and returns policy lasts 30 days. If 30 days have passed since your purchase, we can’t offer you a full refund or exchange.

To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging.

Several types of goods are exempt from being returned. Perishable goods such as food, flowers, newspapers or magazines cannot be returned. We also do not accept products that are intimate or sanitary goods, hazardous materials, or flammable liquids or gases.

Additional non-returnable items:

  • Gift cards
  • Downloadable software products
  • Some health and personal care items

To complete your return, we require a receipt or proof of purchase.

Please do not send your purchase back to the manufacturer.

There are certain situations where only partial refunds are granted:

  • Book with obvious signs of use
  • CD, DVD, VHS tape, software, video game, cassette tape, or vinyl record that has been opened.
  • Any item not in its original condition, is damaged or missing parts for reasons not due to our error.
  • Any item that is returned more than 30 days after delivery

Refunds

Once your return is received and inspected, we will send you an email to notify you that we have received your returned item. We will also notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund.

If you are approved, then your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card or original method of payment, within a certain amount of days.

Late or missing refunds

If you haven’t received a refund yet, first check your bank account again.

Then contact your credit card company, it may take some time before your refund is officially posted.

Next contact your bank. There is often some processing time before a refund is posted.

If you’ve done all of this and you still have not received your refund yet, please contact us at {email address}.

Sale items

Only regular priced items may be refunded. Sale items cannot be refunded.

Exchanges

We only replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you need to exchange it for the same item, send us an email at {email address} and send your item to: {physical address}.

Gifts

If the item was marked as a gift when purchased and shipped directly to you, you’ll receive a gift credit for the value of your return. Once the returned item is received, a gift certificate will be mailed to you.

If the item wasn’t marked as a gift when purchased, or the gift giver had the order shipped to themselves to give to you later, we will send a refund to the gift giver and they will find out about your return.

Shipping returns

To return your product, you should mail your product to: {physical address}.

You will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are non-refundable. If you receive a refund, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund.

Depending on where you live, the time it may take for your exchanged product to reach you may vary.

If you are returning more expensive items, you may consider using a trackable shipping service or purchasing shipping insurance. We don’t guarantee that we will receive your returned item.

Need help?

Contact us at {email} for questions related to refunds and returns.

item.title: Dog’s Best Original Food
item.dc:creator: prabinjha2074@gmail.com
item.content:encoded: Formulated to provide balanced nutrition for dogs of all ages, this food typically contains high-quality protein sources, healthy fats, and essential vitamins and minerals. Options may vary from dry kibble to wet food, with flavors designed to appeal to your dog's taste buds while supporting their overall health and vitality.
item.excerpt:encoded: Formulated to provide balanced nutrition for dogs of all ages, this food typically contains high-quality protein sources, healthy fats, and essential vitamins and minerals. Options may vary from dry kibble to wet food, with flavors designed to appeal to your dog's taste buds while supporting their overall health and vitality.

item.title: Cat’s Best Original Food
item.dc:creator: prabinjha2074@gmail.com
item.content:encoded: Designed specifically for the unique dietary needs of cats, this food is rich in protein and essential nutrients like taurine. Available in both dry and wet varieties, cat food often includes flavorful ingredients that satisfy a cat's instinctual cravings while promoting a healthy coat, strong muscles, and proper hydration.
item.excerpt:encoded: Designed specifically for the unique dietary needs of cats, this food is rich in protein and essential nutrients like taurine. Available in both dry and wet varieties, cat food often includes flavorful ingredients that satisfy a cat's instinctual cravings while promoting a healthy coat, strong muscles, and proper hydration.

item.title: Fish Best Original Food
item.dc:creator: prabinjha2074@gmail.com
item.content:encoded: Specifically formulated for various species of freshwater and saltwater fish, this food comes in flakes, pellets, or freeze-dried forms. It contains essential nutrients, vitamins, and minerals to support growth, color enhancement, and overall health. Options are tailored to meet the dietary needs of different fish, ensuring a balanced diet that promotes vitality and longevity in aquatic environments.
item.excerpt:encoded: Specifically formulated for various species of freshwater and saltwater fish, this food comes in flakes, pellets, or freeze-dried forms. It contains essential nutrients, vitamins, and minerals to support growth, color enhancement, and overall health. Options are tailored to meet the dietary needs of different fish, ensuring a balanced diet that promotes vitality and longevity in aquatic environments.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: The food seems decent, and my pet eats it, but not enthusiastically. Packaging is okay and delivery was fast. Still unsure if I’ll reorder — might try another flavor next time.

item.title: Bird's Best Original Food
item.dc:creator: prabinjha2074@gmail.com
item.content:encoded: Specifically formulated for various species of freshwater and saltwater fish, this food comes in flakes, pellets, or freeze-dried forms. It contains essential nutrients, vitamins, and minerals to support growth, color enhancement, and overall health. Options are tailored to meet the dietary needs of different fish, ensuring a balanced diet that promotes vitality and longevity in aquatic environments.

item.title: Natural Blend Parrot Food
item.dc:creator: prabinjha2074@gmail.com
item.content:encoded: Tailored for various species of birds, this food typically includes a blend of seeds, pellets, fruits, and nuts. Each mix is crafted to meet the specific dietary requirements of different birds, providing essential vitamins and minerals to support their health, vibrant plumage, and energy levels.
item.excerpt:encoded: Tailored for various species of birds, this food typically includes a blend of seeds, pellets, fruits, and nuts. Each mix is crafted to meet the specific dietary requirements of different birds, providing essential vitamins and minerals to support their health, vibrant plumage, and energy levels.

item.title: Top 10 Nutritional Benefits of High-Quality Pet Food
item.dc:creator: petgrub
item.content:encoded:
In today's world, the quality of food we provide our pets plays a pivotal role in their overall health and well-being. Just as humans thrive on balanced, nutritious meals, pets need the right blend of vitamins, minerals, and proteins to stay active, happy, and healthy. In "Paws & Plates," we'll dive into the world of pet nutrition, focusing on the benefits of feeding your furry friends a wholesome diet. Whether you're preparing meals at home or selecting store-bought options, understanding what goes into your pet’s plate is crucial.

"Dolor sit amet consectetur commodo enim ultricies ultricies cras nunc tempu. Mauris dictum augue sed viverra. Integer justo purus leo ac facilisis interdum"

This blog will cover a wide range of topics, from breaking down the essential nutrients that pets need to thrive, to discussing common ingredients in commercial pet foods that may not be as healthy as they seem. We'll share tips on reading pet food labels, selecting the right ingredients, and even meal planning for pets with special dietary needs. Additionally, we’ll explore the importance of hydration and how it ties into a balanced diet. Recipes, expert advice, and personal anecdotes from pet owners who have made the switch to more nutritious meals will provide readers with practical insights and inspiration.

"Paws & Plates" is all about ensuring your pets live their best lives, starting with what's in their bowls. By the end of this post, you'll feel empowered to make informed decisions that contribute to your pets’ happiness, health, and longevity. Link

  • aliquet bibendum sed suspendisse potenti fermentum quisque
  • Non mattis urna ex nec sem. Donec varius diam et suscipit venenati.
  • Dolor sit amet consectetur Sed luctus leo in morbi Nunc

Preparing homemade meals for your pets may seem daunting, but it doesn’t have to be! In “Tail-Wagging Recipes,” we’ll show you how easy it can be to create healthy, balanced meals for your four-legged friends. From simple ingredients to easy-to-follow cooking techniques, this blog aims to take the stress out of pet food preparation.

The focus here will be on recipes that can be made with everyday ingredients. Whether you’re catering to a dog with allergies, a cat with a finicky appetite, or a senior pet with specific dietary requirements, we have recipes that meet every need. We’ll explain how to balance proteins, fats, and carbs to ensure your pet gets the right nutrition in every bite. We’ll also provide guides for selecting pet-safe ingredients and avoiding common food pitfalls, like harmful seasonings or toxic foods such as chocolate and onions.

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: prabinjha2074@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:
About Us

Our mission: Keeping animals healthy

We're building a world where every pet enjoys fresher meals and a healthier life, every day :)

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipiscing elit sed<br>do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore

10+

Years Experience

20+

Awards

18+

Pet Nutritionist

90%

Client Satisfaction

What We Provide

Pet Nutrition

Our certified pet nutritionists offer personalized dietary plans tailored to your pet's specific needs. We focus on balanced nutrition that supports health, energy, and longevity.

Food Quality and Safety

We prioritize the highest standards in food quality and safety. Our rigorous testing and sourcing ensure that every meal meets strict guidelines, giving you peace of mind about your pet's diet.

Pet Health and Wellbeing

Our holistic approach to pet health encompasses preventive care, wellness check-ups, and tailored health plans. We aim to enhance your pet's overall wellbeing, keeping them happy and thriving.

Pets All Accessories

Explore our extensive range of pet accessories, from toys and grooming supplies to collars and beds. We provide high-quality products designed to enrich your pet's life and meet their every need.

Follow us on Instagram

Tag @petgrub in your Instagram photos for a chance to be featured here.

Visit Our Instagram

item.title: Gravy Canned Cat Food
item.dc:creator: prabinjha2074@gmail.com
item.content:encoded: Cat food nutrition focuses on providing a balanced diet tailored to a cat's specific needs. Key components include high-quality protein for muscle maintenance, essential fatty acids for healthy skin and coat, and vital vitamins and minerals for overall health. Additionally, many cat foods are formulated to support hydration, digestive health, and urinary tract function. It's important to choose age-appropriate formulas, as kittens, adults, and seniors have different nutritional requirements.
item.excerpt:encoded: Cat food nutrition focuses on providing a balanced diet tailored to a cat's specific needs. Key components include high-quality protein for muscle maintenance, essential fatty acids for healthy skin and coat, and vital vitamins and minerals for overall health. Additionally, many cat foods are formulated to support hydration, digestive health, and urinary tract function. It's important to choose age-appropriate formulas, as kittens, adults, and seniors have different nutritional requirements.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: My cat refused to eat this food. I even tried mixing it with her old food, but no luck. Ended up giving it away. Waste of money for me.

item.title: Adult Cat Food - Chicken
item.dc:creator: prabinjha2074@gmail.com
item.content:encoded: Cat food nutrition is essential for maintaining a cat's overall health and wellbeing. A balanced diet should include high-quality proteins (like meat or fish), essential fats, vitamins, and minerals. Cats are obligate carnivores, meaning they require animal-based nutrients. Look for formulas that meet AAFCO standards and consider the cat's age, activity level, and any specific health needs when choosing food. Hydration is also important, so wet food can be beneficial in addition to dry kibble.
item.excerpt:encoded: Cat food nutrition is essential for maintaining a cat's overall health and wellbeing. A balanced diet should include high-quality proteins (like meat or fish), essential fats, vitamins, and minerals. Cats are obligate carnivores, meaning they require animal-based nutrients. Look for formulas that meet AAFCO standards and consider the cat's age, activity level, and any specific health needs when choosing food. Hydration is also important, so wet food can be beneficial in addition to dry kibble.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: My cat enjoys this food and had no digestive issues switching over. I appreciate the natural ingredients and the lack of fillers. I just wish it was a bit more affordable.

item.title: Dog Harness Nylon Strap
item.dc:creator: prabinjha2074@gmail.com
item.content:encoded: The Dog Harness Nylon Strap is a durable and adjustable harness designed for comfort and safety during walks. Made from high-quality nylon, it features a breathable design to prevent chafing and irritation. With easy-to-use clips and multiple adjustment points, it ensures a secure fit for dogs of all sizes. The harness also includes a sturdy leash attachment point, making it ideal for training and everyday use. Perfect for active dogs, it promotes better control and reduces strain on the neck.

item.excerpt:encoded: Vivamus nisi sapien, elementum sit amet eros sit amet, ultricies cursus ipsum. Sed consequat luctus ligula. Curabitur laoreet rhoncus blandit.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I've tried several brands, but this one is by far the best. The ingredients seem high-quality, and my dog finishes every last bite. His coat is shinier, and he has more energy. Highly recommended!

(4.9) Reviews

Win Your Order

Share your review and automatically enter for a chance to win a full refund on your purchase!

Review The Product

Reviews and Awards

What pet parents are saying

PetGrub's dog treats are a hit with my pup, but the packaging was damaged. They sent a replacement fast, which was great. I'll shop here again.

Laura K.

The cat toy I got from PetGrub was fun, but it broke after a week. Customer service was helpful and offered a refund. I expected better quality.

David H.

PetGrub's fish food is top-notch, and my tank is thriving. Fast shipping and great prices made it a win. I'm so happy and will order again soon!

I ordered a leash from PetGrub, but it was too short for my dog. The website was okay, but the return process was slow. I might try again later.

Ethan C.

PetGrub's rabbit hay is fresh and my bunny loves it! Quick delivery and eco-friendly packaging won me over. I\’m excited to shop here again soon!

Emma T.
